OOC: Thank you, Alloran. But you must admit, I was just as bad, perhaps wor=
se than you were. Right around the time you joined, Alloran, I joined as we=
ll. So I guess it's been a year since I was here, too. My first post was th=
e greatest way I could have started out. Sinesis landing his ship on Cybert=
ron by crashing into a building and searching for Hell Beast, eventually fi=
nding the Predacon base. Classic, is it not?...
  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: Alloran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesda=
y, April 03, 2001 6:06 PM
  Subject: Its been 1 year!(Everyone read)


  OO=
C: It's April 3rd, a day that seems ordinary to most of you, but not for 
 =
 me.  Today was the day, 1 year ago, that i joined this RPG.  I had been do=
ing 
  searches all over the internet for RPGs, but none really caught my e=
ye until 
  i saw the link- Neo Beast Wars RPG. I decided id like to check =
it out, and 
  fell in love as soon as i read the story and looked at the c=
haracters.  I 
  knew i must join immeadiately, so i used an old favorite c=
haracter, Torca.   
  My profile was an immeadiate mode, and i was pretty s=
tupid when i was new.  I 
  remember my first post like it was yesterday.  =
Torca burst into the Predacon 
  base and put his gun up to Quickstrike and=
 tried to eliminate his spark.   
  Talon got really pissed at me.  But soo=
n i started to catch on, and created 
  stronger characters and some good s=
tories.  In my time here in the RPG, i saw 
  many changes.  I've seen ultr=
a-powerful groups rise and fall, extremely 
  talented RPers come and go(no=
t to mention a lot of idiots), and built 
  firendships with members.  Id l=
ike to thank Soulstice for his friendship and 
  partnership, Zardus for pu=
tting up with me through my early times, and 
  everyone else that ive had =
the pleasure(or displeasure) of RPing with, and i 
  hope my next year here=
 will be even better.  Just wanted to get that off my 
  chest. 
        Ya=
hoo! Groups Sponsor 

        Click for Details 
       

  Your use of Yah=
oo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
